name: 2022 4th International Artificial Intelligence Technology Conference
content: AITC 2022 information: 1\. AITC 2022 is supported by ACM Singapore Chapter. 2\. Accepted papers will be published in the Conference Proceedings by ACM, which is indexed by EI Compendex, Scopus, and submitted to be reviewed by Thomson Reuters Conference Proceedings Citation Index (CPCI). 3\. Prof. Chin-Chen Chang from Feng Chia University, Taiwan will be the keynote speaker. 4\. Prof. Feng-Jen Yang from Florida Polytechnic University, USA, Prof. M.A.JABBAR from Vardhaman College of Engineering, India, Prof. Raja Kumar Murugesan from Taylor's University, Malaysia and Dr. Gabriella Casalino from University of Bari, Italy will be our Invited Speaks.
